item.description:
Event Description: Organizer: Eileen
Contact: eaconway@yahoo.com
Target Audience: All members that are interested in a free meal

Dear Members,

I just got a call from the Ginger Pad located at the new Wayside Commons in Burlington. I won a free dinner for 10 people! Technically it was lunch but they agreed to let us do it for dinner time. If you are interested please RSVP with yes - only if you are 100% positive you can make it. I am also posting this to my New England Photography Network, 30 Something Boston, Nuttings Lake Association meetup groups.

If you run a group and want to post it to your calendar please let me know how many people confirm yes by upping your RSVP number and putting it in your RSVP comments.

Did I mention free meal of your choice and non-alcohol drinks. You can get alcohol they just can't include it in the free meal for legal reasons ... http://www.gingerpad....

Cheers, Eileen

Passionate Foodie comments: http://passionatefood...
item.name: NEPN: Free Dinner at Ginger Pad!!
